mapper.insert: insert into lms_class (instructorEmail, className, startDate, active) values (#{instructorEmail}, #{className}, #{startDate}, #{active})
mapper.select: select * from lms_class order by id
mapper.insert: insert into lms_attendance (instructorEmail, className, startDate, weeks, days) values (#{instructorEmail}, #{className}, #{startDate}, #{weeks}, #{days})
mapper.select: select * from lms_attendance order by attendanceID
